analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol:
	Contract ICO has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#499-500)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in PreICO.mintExtraTokens (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#729-744):
	External calls:
	- mintTokens(bountyTokensWallet,bountyTokens) (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#731-736)
	- mintTokens(advisorsTokensWallet,advisorsTokens) (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#736-738)
	- mintTokens(developersTokensWallet,developersTokens) (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#738-742)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- extraMinted (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#742-744)

RetrieveTokensFeature.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#380-391) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(to,alienToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#387-389)

CommonSale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#460-466) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,tokens) (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#461-462)
	-token.transfer(to,tokens) (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#462-464)

ICO.finish (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#626-628) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#628)

PreICO.finish (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#754-760) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#756-757)

Reentrancy in PreICO.mintTokensByETH (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#746-754):
	External calls:
	- _tokens = super.mintTokensByETH(to,_invested) (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#748-750)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#751-752)
	- softcapAchieved (/unique_chucks/40/0xf2ebc3b384464c08357e7bdf10c8e517f3ddb473.sol#751-752)
